title: The new update is a downgrade
review: So I have recently started playing this game again in quarantine and I have had many issues with the game. The day after I redownloaded it and already played it it would not load. I would leave it for ten minutes and it would still not load. I emailed the company and they never got back to me. It has been about two months. Another problem is that the new update (in my opinion) has made the game look very old and childish. It looks like it is from the 90s. I highly dislike the new style of the game. I also purchased double coins many years ago and now I cannot get it back even when I restore my purchase. I‚Äôm not going to waste my time emailing the company because I will not get an answer. The items in the game are also way too expensive. It took me almost 3 weeks of playing for about 45 minutes a day to get the hoverboard that I wanted. I will change my rating if the company will take this review into consideration and realize that many people are not a fan of the new update and other features, especially all the bugs that the new update has.
sentence: I emailed the company and they never got back to me.

title: The. Most. Fun. Possible.
review: You can play this game at home with friends. Out with friends. At family functions. At the bar. In the airport during a delay. Around the water cooler at work. In the line at the BMV. Family reunion. At a group potty break. In between sets at your kid's band concert. Wherever you have cell service. One gripe... Add a ‚ÄúGolden Girls‚Äù deck.
sentence: One gripe... Add a ‚ÄúGolden Girls‚Äù deck.

title: Easy pass
review: I‚Äôve seen these ads for a long time before deciding to try it out. I deleted it after reaching level 20. The reason I deleted it is because it‚Äôs too boring to me. It was interesting fixing up the house but having to use multiple stars for some aspects and even to move to the next day is greedy. The bank I despised. Good premise but it holds coins you earn hostage unless you pay to buy it once you accumulate 3000 or 5000 coins. There is no choice either, you watch your coins disappear. The small mini games shown in the ads are the best part but they are way too few and far between. The majority of this game is playing levels over and over trying to get the next star to fix the never ending repairs. I also found having to use stars to open packages annoying. If I‚Äôm getting a gift it should be just. There is some humor and the scenes are colorful which is why i gave it two stars. Had the earning of coins been much higher, the mini games much more prevalent, the bank either free to obtain or at least an option, the limiting of one star per repair and not having to use stars on anything other than repairs I could have seen playing this longer. I tried these match three types of games several times now and always delete them quickly once the repetition of levels hits. If the match three aspect was a minor part rather than 90% of playing these would be tremendous fun, I‚Äôd even consider paying for that.
sentence: I deleted it after reaching level 20.

title: Many Repeats
review: Heads Up has very few choices for the words in the decks they give. In the modern age, adding a million new cards and options would be quick and easy. But even after charging you for the initial game, you‚Äôll need new decks after 10 minutes of play to stop repeats. Have another $30 to lay down to get more words? Don‚Äôt bother with the initial $.99.
sentence: Don‚Äôt bother with the initial $.99.

title: Fun but frustrating
review: So I been playing for almost a year now and I‚Äôm on the 1000+ levels. It‚Äôs fun but it totally clickbait me on Instagram with the little games that I haven‚Äôt seen once after downloading. I‚Äôve gotten so frustrated so many times I had to stop playing for a couple of days because the levels get so hard you need god to help you and not boosters. Sometimes the normal levels are harder than the hard ones. Not only that but you start by collecting 1 star per game to having to pass multiple levels for one task, which can take 3 stars per task when it used to be 1 Star per task. And I hate when you‚Äôre remodeling a room and at of nowhere something happens in another room you have to fix. Like, everything is supposed to be new, why are they making me waste my stars on a room I had already finished ? And 5 lives isn‚Äôt enough! Either give me more lives or make them take less than 30 minutes each to reload. Oh and lastly if you‚Äôre getting a gift for infinite time let us choose when we can use it. I shouldn‚Äôt have to waste it because I had work or class. Sometimes you can‚Äôt play for 2 hours at that very second. Your girl has a life too you know.
sentence: Either give me more lives or make them take less than 30 minutes each to reload.

title: Great! Also might I request a feature?
review: I love this game!!! It‚Äôs so fun! But, I would like to request a feature. Could there be an option to have more intelligent crew mates/impostors in free play? For example: I start up free play and see an option saying ‚Äúwould you like to turn on intelligent mode?‚Äù I turn it on and free play starts. It has usual free play features like picking tasks and being the impostor. But with one major difference: the AI is more intelligent. I‚Äôll give you a look at both sides of this mode. CREWMATE VIEW:You run around doing tasks with the other AI crew mates. And one of the crew mates is the impostor. The impostor‚Äôs AI does intelligent stuff like: trapping you in rooms, sabotaging electricity and such, and so much more! IMPOSTOR VIEW:The crew mates are doing tasks. While your the impostor. You take down the AI crew mates and such. But the AI crew mates does intelligent things like the AI impostor. Like:Reporting dead bodies, calling emergency meetings, and so much more! I would love to see all of this added into free play mode. I will be awaiting your response.EDIT:Ok, I think a great feature to have would be when the impostor kills you and your pet cries, you can comfort it. Like pet it and tell it everything is gonna be okay. Then it‚Äôs happy and it starts following your ghost. I would love this feature. Once again, I will be awaiting your response.‚ÄîYour biggest fan
sentence: Like pet it and tell it everything is gonna be okay.

title: Good start but a few suggestions
review: Overall the game is enjoyable, but a couple of annoying issues: the 3D city looks good but it‚Äôs not in 3D very often and when it is it‚Äôs usually obstructed by a game card, property purchase and so on. Would be nice to see the city in 3D more often during gameplay. The ‚Äúyour turn‚Äù banner obstructs the dice momentarily. The dice should never be obstructed. When adding houses to the purple properties, the add houses button extends over the purple properties making it difficult to add properties there. I find myself accidentally not buying a property because the buy or not buy buttons are too close together. Maybe a different layout for buying properties. For games against the computer it would be nice to limit the number of times the computer offers a trade. It gets to the point where it is offering trades on every dice roll which slows the game down. For the custom rule set, having an option to start the game with more money would be nice. The EA version of this game had a terrific animation for the game pieces. Would be nice to see the something similar here.
sentence: The EA version of this game had a terrific animation for the game pieces.

title: Fun but frustrating
review: So I been playing for almost a year now and I‚Äôm on the 1000+ levels. It‚Äôs fun but it totally clickbait me on Instagram with the little games that I haven‚Äôt seen once after downloading. I‚Äôve gotten so frustrated so many times I had to stop playing for a couple of days because the levels get so hard you need god to help you and not boosters. Sometimes the normal levels are harder than the hard ones. Not only that but you start by collecting 1 star per game to having to pass multiple levels for one task, which can take 3 stars per task when it used to be 1 Star per task. And I hate when you‚Äôre remodeling a room and at of nowhere something happens in another room you have to fix. Like, everything is supposed to be new, why are they making me waste my stars on a room I had already finished ? And 5 lives isn‚Äôt enough! Either give me more lives or make them take less than 30 minutes each to reload. Oh and lastly if you‚Äôre getting a gift for infinite time let us choose when we can use it. I shouldn‚Äôt have to waste it because I had work or class. Sometimes you can‚Äôt play for 2 hours at that very second. Your girl has a life too you know.
sentence: So I been playing for almost a year now and I‚Äôm on the 1000+ levels.

title: Homescapes
review: I liked the game at first but the more you try to play, the more ridiculous and costly it gets. I love all kinds of match 3 games, but the more I try to play both Homescapes and Gardenscapes the more frustrating they get. I believe games should be fun and challening, but come on, this is beyond ridiculous. I looked and read other reviews, a lot of them, nd they all basically say the same thing. I cannot believe Playrix, the developers and makers of some really wonderful games came up with something this impossible to play. The Develpoers REALLY need to pay attention to the reviews. They should really listen and make some serious changes to fix what could be a wonderful game. I think the developers should fix the game so the power ups are on the side so you can choose when to use them, and if you have any left they should be useable on the next level. I think the developers need to really read the reviews and seriously think about making some changes. One change, let us choose when to use our boosts or power ups. Put them on the side and let us be able to use them during a level at nytimei stead of all of them at once. Does anyone know if any of the developers even read the reviews. Why ask us to rate the game and write reviews when it doesn‚Äôt seem like the makers of the game are even reading them.
sentence: I think the developers need to really read the reviews and seriously think about making some changes.

title: Great game! One issue only
review: This game is awesome and I love that you can choose from different boards and many tokens. The only issue that I have come across is that when you purchase a theme bundle that has tokens included in the bundle, the tokens will not be unlocked unless you go and click on the ‚ÄúRestore Purchases‚Äù button in the settings menu. This extra step should not be necessary. The other reason I am writing this four stars is because of the AI players sometimes make a terrible trading deal, where one AI ends up with a full street and ready to build houses, where the other is still needing another street, so basically getting the short end of the stick. Dumb moves like that typically put one AI player way ahead of everybody else early in the game, and I would never make a move like that to help one player start building houses before I would be able to do so as well. Other than that, this is really one of the best, if not the best, board game in the App Store!
sentence: This game is awesome and I love that you can choose from different boards and many tokens.

title: Game Breaking Mechanics.
review: Hello, I have played several games of Monopoly on this app. So far, the games have all been 4 players with 3 AI all on easy mode.  All my games just so happen to go the same way.  At first, because the AI is on easy mode, I to great! I‚Äôm usually the first to get monopoly while the AI is rolling decent and realistic rolls. This positive trend follows into the middle game up until the endgame. During the endgame, their is a switch.  With 2 players bankrupt, me having a thousand dollars minimum 2-4 monopolies all with a few houses and hotels. The other player is generally just as good. But, something changes. For some reason the AI just so happens to just the correct numbers to avoid my hotels/2-4 houses...for like 6 rotations to the board... they literally almost never land on my properties when there is only one AI left.  Me in contrary, is landing on every single one of their and gets all the chance cards which make me pay more. The chance cards they land on gives them money no matter what in the endgame. You cannot tell me this game is rigged against the player. Sometimes AI‚Äôs came back several thousands of dollars and ended up winning.  The game while fun, is against the human player. If not, explain my experiences. ‚ÄúWhich happened consecutively‚Äù
sentence: The chance cards they land on gives them money no matter what in the endgame.

title: I love this game but....
review: Fix your glitches! I get stuck on certain screens and get kicked off. It‚Äôs not my connection nor my internet because I‚Äôve played live games like this a lot and have no issues. But I hate it when I‚Äôm winning and all of a sudden I get stuck on a screen and can‚Äôt do anything. At the very least allow us to leave a refresh or come right back or something to fix this issue. I always have no choice but to quit to menu! It‚Äôs very frustrating! You could allow like a 30 second window if a player doesn‚Äôt return and play. Also you should add a chat feature even if it‚Äôs preprogrammed with emojis or phrases or something it would be more fun if we could communicate. Time limit or limit the amount of offers/trades in one turn each person could get a maximum of 3 in each turn. This goes for the counter offers also if green tries to trade pink; pink can counter offer that counts as one offer each. They can counter back twice more each and then they either reject or take the trade, and their turn is over.
sentence: It‚Äôs very frustrating!

title: Great Game, A few notes tho
review: It‚Äôs a really good game but I have a some suggestions. Do you think you can make it to where when you die as a crew mate, you can see who the imposters are. Like there red names show up. Can you also make it to where you can like add ppl as you friend. Like your in a chat and you want to be friends with someone, you can tap there person a new it can be like a profile type thing and you can chat personally and invite them into games. Can you also make it to where you can keep passed games you made. Like say you hosted a game and you like the people in the game, can you make it to where you can have like a place where all your passed games where at and keep it there. Can you also maybe make it where you can favorite lobby. Like there can be a button like a heart or something and you can go to like a tab and go to your favorite lobby‚Äôs. Do you also think you can it where when you die you can a have an overview of the whole map. But only when you die so it‚Äôs fair. Do you also think you can make something called ‚Äúwatch mode‚Äù when you can watch other people play games and you can be I there body‚Äôs and watch as they play and overview the map. Think these ideas while make the game way more fun than it already is. I REALLY HOPE YOU CAN CONSIDER THEM. LIVE YOU SWEETHEARTSüòòüòòüòòüòò
sentence: Do you think you can make it to where when you die as a crew mate, you can see who the imposters are.

title: App Crashes before it Opens
review: Let me start by saying, I love playing this app so much! That said, I have been unable to open this app since the update. This has happened in the past, but I have been able to troubleshoot it by restarting my device or making sure my IOS was up to date. This time is different. When I click on the game app, I get the welcome screen for about a half second before it crashes. I‚Äôm afraid to delete and redone load the app because I have purchased about 15 decks over the last 4 years. I‚Äôm getting no responses from the email support and I‚Äôm very frustrated. I love this game. It‚Äôs is especially great to play while social distancing. Now, I have to rate it 1 star because I can‚Äôt even play it. Total bummer.
sentence: I‚Äôm afraid to delete and redone load the app because I have purchased about 15 decks over the last 4 years.

title: Honestly this is just madness.
review: Now don't get me wrong. I really like minecraft. But don't just go like "oooh this guy is wrong he don't know what he is talking about" Well the people who say that could be right but I am a experienced player. I have seen the updates and changes. I have played since when even if you were in creative mode, hostile mobs such as creepers would put forth the best effort to kill you. Or they still follow you and explode in creative mode in the MCPE I enjoyed. Keyword: enjoyed. This is supposed to be portable? Hence "Pocket Edition" but now if I play it without wi-if it crashes. I played when hunger bars didn't exist. When it would be that if you move in water you swim up, when mobs could attack you from underwater or well let's say I was really deep into the ocean. The zombie just attacks me if I am under it. When you couldn't well screw it I just played for a long time let's say that. A suggestion? The launcher like choosing a mcpe version you like.  Just like java. Also please add the option to remove features and mobs without turning cheats on. Let's say I removed drowned. Cheats don't turn off. If I remove all hostile mobs. Never. Mind just bring old mcpe back with the launcher to change versions also fix the bug without wifi it crashes.
sentence: When you couldn't well screw it I just played for a long time let's say that.

title: On a scale of 1-10 it would be a 8
review: I love Minecraft and have playing since it was on the Xbox 360, and I have loved everything about it! But recently it‚Äôs been laggy, glitchy and it even crashes when I try to play. Normally the game isn‚Äôt that slow but when ever I‚Äôm not on WiFi or have a poor connection , it takes 5 minutes to just to make the type of world that I want! Before the game would be a little slower than normal, but never THAT slow. I could be casually playing and it would glitch so bad, it would crash! And oddly enough when I try to pause the games it would take over 5 minutes for it to load the menu. Besides that, the gameplay is good, and the graphics are outstanding when you have a good internet connection. The servers are fun to play, and often has a variety of games on the servers. The game updates every once in a while and often features a fun new addition. And the in-game shop has a few free skins, worlds and has deals that are often good. However, when there isn‚Äôt a deal or a promotion for the shop the items can be quite expensive. The items range from 100 coins (0.99) to over 1,000 coins (around $20). Unless you are willing to put in money, you won‚Äôt have the more fun and interactive worlds/skins. TL;DRGood game overall. Has a fun shop with some free stuff and has fun updates. Has some bad glitches but bearable.
sentence: But recently it‚Äôs been laggy, glitchy and it even crashes when I try to play.

title: Ok at first BUT not fair
review: This game is fun at first but as you rank up higher and higher the more often u get hard levels. It‚Äôs annoying I‚Äôve only had this game for a week and I‚Äôm uninstalling it. You need stars to complete tasks and you only get one when u pass the level. As u rank up the more stars  u need to complete ONE task it‚Äôs not fair. Also I downloaded the game mainly to be able to redecorate the house and once you finish the kitchen you get sent outside to build the garden/ greenhouse. It is the most boring part of the game that takes FOREVER to finish. You can finish a room in 1-3 days of completion. But the outside has taken 6+ days to work on and I finally just gave up because of how many unnecessary tasks you have to complete just to get through one day. Every time u think your finally done with the outside theirs something stupid you have to still do. This game is only fun for a few days after that it‚Äôll just make you want to throw your phone in the garbage. Also the amount of coins you get for each level is unbelievable you should be able to get more the higher you level up but nope they just want you to try to buy their packages. Something no game will ever get out of me. As soon as games start to cheat you into wanting to spend your real money is when it gets deleted from my phone. I recommend finding another game to play unless you have plenty of patience for bull*hit.
sentence: You need stars to complete tasks and you only get one when u pass the level.

title: You DO NOT need to pay to play
review: I have had this game ever since it came to the App Store and have never spent a dime on the game. To anyone surfing through reviews to see whether they should get it not: The game is free and you do not need to spend any money to play, unless your really impatient. I now from experience; I am on level 1147 and it takes a while to beat some levels, but, they ARE NOT IMPOSSIBLE. Also, the ads that they show are not what the game is and I was disappointed to see them myself since I like the game a lot and wish they would just have ads that are what the game is. Instead, the game is a candy crush style game where you get stars and coins for every level you beat. With the stars you can customize your mansion and continue the story of a butler and his family. The coins are just meant to be saved up to buy power ups and refill lives (the lives regenerate). This has been an honest review of the game from me.P.S - Joining Houses/Teams is a very good idea because you get coins when teammates buy passes, and teammates can HELP you on levels your stumped on as well as give you lives when your out.
sentence: With the stars you can customize your mansion and continue the story of a butler and his family.

title: Must pay $ to be able to advance
review: I actually love this game, but you end up having to spend $ to advance: It‚Äôs easy to play, the ‚Äúpuzzles‚Äù that you play to be able to build things for the house are fun, & challenging. But you reach a certain point where you have to have boosters to beat the levels, & because Playtrix only gives you a max of 70 coins for each level beat (a taudry amount considering what things cost in the game), you end up spending  your own money  to be able to keep playing levels, or to be able to buy boosters to beat the levels. To break it down for you: I‚Äôm at level 122 (which is impossible to beat without a booster because of how it is set up), which is about midway through the 5th decoration level in the game (haven‚Äôt even broached the upstairs level yet). I‚Äôve already spent $60 on coins/boosters, & I‚Äôve only been playing 2 weeks. Not going to spend anymore $ on this (even though I enjoy it) simply on principle. The rewards for levels are not anywhere close to what they should be, & the amounts you get for what you pay for aren‚Äôt enough either. In other games if you spent $20 you would be set for a couple weeks. This game ends up being a days at most because of demand for boosters/coins to the cost ratio. I see this company fizzling out soon because of this. It‚Äôs a shame. They have a good game. If the reward system worked like Zynga games then they might last.
sentence: In other games if you spent $20 you would be set for a couple weeks.

title: I can make this game better
review: So I love Minecraft. I‚Äôm obsessed with hardcore survival through never ending creative builds. I love the nether and the end. I hope the end gets updated but that is not what I am here for. 1st of, I want to make a whole new type of Minecraft world called service.This would be a pre-server world so that you can put the build in there into a server without the whole ‚Äú24 7 hour update that I waste my day on.‚Äù 2nd, I want to make a new land called ‚Äúthe fade.‚Äù This area would be all faded. But it wasn‚Äôt always that way...if you find and defeat the forden (A small mob that is is visible but will fade if you look at it.) If you find the power source that causes this mob to fade you cow destroy it. That mob will drop something called the Fax enchantment to gloves (which y‚Äôall should add too) and you touch something the whole world will spring with life. Then a door will appear out of no where to take you back to the over world when you are ready. This will also contain Force oars and on and on. 3rd, A time traveler. If you kill a wither, enderdragon, and forden, they will drop something called Broken map. If you place the three pieces together it will unlock something called a time traveler. This can take you to places from When those shipwrecks weren‚Äôt shipwrecks to when the villagers actually LIKED diamonds. Thanks for reading!
sentence: If you kill a wither, enderdragon, and forden, they will drop something called Broken map.

title: I used to give this game 5 stars and now I‚Äôm giving it 2 stars ‚òπÔ∏è
review: I don‚Äôt like the update that they did...at all. First of all when the game updated it basically restarted the game and got rid of all my coins, keys, characters...everything. I am pretty mad about that because it took a long time to save up for all the characters I got. I‚Äôm really lucky because I didn‚Äôt use any money to buy anything. If I did and they deleted everything then that would mean I just spent and wasted a whole lot of money. And I‚Äôm pretty sure that is what happened to other people who bought stuff using real money. Another thing is the design. It‚Äôs not that great. The graphics and layout are really childish. And now for some reason the game takes FOREVER to load. And it also for some reason only works at a certain time of day. It didn‚Äôt do that before this terrible update came out. And it‚Äôs not my WiFi because every other game works expect this one ‚òπÔ∏è. It‚Äôs really annoying because I used to give this game 5 stars but now I‚Äôm giving it 2 stars.....yeah that pretty bad. I understand you guys wanted to try something different since the game has been the same for several years now. But this update hasn‚Äôt been your best work in fact it‚Äôs been the worst. I would like if you guys went back to the original subway surfers. And I think a lot of other people would like that too. üòïüòï
sentence: I understand you guys wanted to try something different since the game has been the same for several years now.

title: Well developed game
review: I do indeed enjoy playing this game.  I play it normally thru out the day.  It helps the time go by quickly.  The only thing that bothers me is the hard and extra hard part of the game.  I realize that it breaks up the monotony, but, I spend days sometimes trying to beat the level.  But, it is good that the hard and extra hard are few and far between, so it‚Äôs not overwhelming, it‚Äôs a good change of pace. And, as others have said, rewards are few and far between as well.  Especially with the hard levels, the rewards are just this: your normal level low coin reward is doubled and you are rewarded with one extra star.  I know you have to make money in this venture, but, your doing it to the detriment of your customers.  There is a reason we play games that say that they are free, it‚Äôs because a lot of us do not have the funds to use actual money to progress farther in the game faster then the other players that can afford to use their hard earned money.  In conclusion, I think this game is well worth 5 stars, however, I did only give it 4 stars on account of the hard and very hard levels & the lack of well deserved rewards.  I think there should be better rewards and it should be a little easier to get stars.  Just my opinion for what it‚Äôs worth.  But, great game!
sentence: The only thing that bothers me is the hard and extra hard part of the game.

title: Great! Also might I request a feature?
review: I love this game!!! It‚Äôs so fun! But, I would like to request a feature. Could there be an option to have more intelligent crew mates/impostors in free play? For example: I start up free play and see an option saying ‚Äúwould you like to turn on intelligent mode?‚Äù I turn it on and free play starts. It has usual free play features like picking tasks and being the impostor. But with one major difference: the AI is more intelligent. I‚Äôll give you a look at both sides of this mode. CREWMATE VIEW:You run around doing tasks with the other AI crew mates. And one of the crew mates is the impostor. The impostor‚Äôs AI does intelligent stuff like: trapping you in rooms, sabotaging electricity and such, and so much more! IMPOSTOR VIEW:The crew mates are doing tasks. While your the impostor. You take down the AI crew mates and such. But the AI crew mates does intelligent things like the AI impostor. Like:Reporting dead bodies, calling emergency meetings, and so much more! I would love to see all of this added into free play mode. I will be awaiting your response.EDIT:Ok, I think a great feature to have would be when the impostor kills you and your pet cries, you can comfort it. Like pet it and tell it everything is gonna be okay. Then it‚Äôs happy and it starts following your ghost. I would love this feature. Once again, I will be awaiting your response.‚ÄîYour biggest fan
sentence: But the AI crew mates does intelligent things like the AI impostor.

title: Great but the update, not so great
review: I‚Äôve been playing this almost daily since 2012!  Great, mindless way to decompress after a long day. The update however.... I just downloaded the most recent update to the update and it seems to be a bit better. The controls are still a bit whacked out. It seems to have a hard time figuring out that you are trying to move left when in midair. Always seems to want to roll or jump instead. I do not notice the same when moving right. The pogo sticks need some reworking. I can rarely see which lane the prize is in at the end of the jump. Finally, some of the challenges have not been working. I had one with no rolls or jumps in a certain number of points that would not increment or ever reach success criteria no matter how long I went. Then suddenly would declare success out of the blue. Another one where I have to clear so many hurdles, and then another where I have to run through bushes, don‚Äôt seem to work if I currently have a power up. Would be nice to have these fixed!Keep up the great work. Thanks and cheers!
sentence: Finally, some of the challenges have not been working.

title: The new update is unnecessary
review: I have loved playing Among Us up until the new update, when they added a quick chat feature instead of letting you type whatever you want. I know this is good for internet safety etc etc but it‚Äôs really annoying. First of all the age limit should not be 18. For those of you who don‚Äôt have the game what I mean is that people under 18 have to use the quick chat feature instead of saying whatever. But if you‚Äôre over 18 you can use free chat and say whatever you want. I feel that the age limit should be 13 or 14 instead of 18. Like, the majority of this game‚Äôs players are under 18 and I don‚Äôt think that people over 13 really need that level of ‚Äúinternet safety‚Äù protection. Second of all with this new quick chat it takes away some of the things that you want to say about who the imposter is and why you are suspicious of them and whatnot. Some things are so unique you just need to put them in your own words. For example the other day I was playing and I saw Orange running away from a dead body. I reported the body but there was no option to say ‚Äú(A) was running away from the body.‚Äù Some things are so unlikely or one-time happenings that they don‚Äôt have options to say it, but when it does happen you can‚Äôt do anything about it. That‚Äôs why I don‚Äôt like this new update and wish that Among Us would go back to the way it was before.
sentence: I know this is good for internet safety etc etc but it‚Äôs really annoying.

title: Great game, can always be better
review: Hi, so I‚Äôve been reading reviews on this game and one thing I have seen come up many times is a microphone added for players to chat with one another. Now I think this could be a good idea, but I have to disagree. You see I think this will discourage players to use the regular typing chat we already have, and for players that A. aren‚Äôt allowed to talk to strangers. And B. Don‚Äôt have a mic, or just are in a crowded room, would not be able to experience the game! Because if they couldn‚Äôt use the voice chat they wouldn‚Äôt be able to hear or talk because everyone would be using the voice chat, the regular chat would be obsolete. And that would make those people stop playing among us! Which would not be very helpful to your company. Also I have read about the hide and seek mode, and really think that should be added along with other modes; because the game as is, gets boring after a month or so. Personally I haven‚Äôt played this game in months because of the lack of variety, I also think a friend system is the #1 thing you need right now because when players who have bonded over a few games are lost to each other forever when they quit/disconnect. All in all it is a very good game with neat gameplay, I just think you need to think about your future because even a game this fun can die fast. Definitely recommend.
sentence: And B. Don‚Äôt have a mic, or just are in a crowded room, would not be able to experience the game!

title: Fun at first, gets boring
review: Here are the reasons I rated it 3 star:#1: It‚Äôs very addicting and fun to play at first, and you don‚Äôt want turn it off#2: The top run thingy is very fun. It makes you push yourself harder and harder to beat the other people‚Äôs high score. This gets you in a competitive mood and makes the game much more fun.#3: Unlocking characters and boards is another way to have more fun in the game. You collect keys and coins over and over until you have enough to unlock that character that you just HAD to have. This gives you another thing to work towards.Although the game has many fun features, it also has a few problems. Here is why I left off two stars#1: Let me set the scene: You‚Äôve seen everybody else have subway surf, so you beg your mom to let you get it. She says yes, so you go to the App Store and download it. You start playing and realize how addicting it is!! You play nonstop for hours. *2 months later* You haven‚Äôt played in a bit, so you open up the app and start playing. You instantly get bored. The problem with this game is that you do the same thing over and over again, different setting or not. It gets very boring. #2: You can‚Äôt get all the characters. Some of them cost money , and some of them you have to have a certain social media for, and some people aren‚Äôt old enough to have FaceBook or whatever.Overall it‚Äôs a fun game but don‚Äôt plan on it being addicting for very long
sentence: You collect keys and coins over and over until you have enough to unlock that character that you just HAD to have.

title: The new update is a downgrade

I would leave it for ten minutes and it would still not load. I emailed the company and they never got back to me. It has been about two months. Another problem is that the new update (in my opinion) has made the game look very old and childish. It looks like it is from the 90s. I highly dislike the new style of the game. I also purchased double coins many years ago and now I cannot get it back even when I restore my purchase. I‚Äôm not going to waste my time emailing the company because I will not get an answer. The items in the game are also way too expensive. It took me almost 3 weeks of playing for about 45 minutes a day to get the hoverboard that I wanted. I will change my rating if the company will take this review into consideration and realize that many people are not a fan of the new update and other features, especially all the bugs that the new update has.

title: Do the developers read this?? I think not!!!
review: Almost all the reviews boil down to the same basic complements and complaints.  So why is nothing done to change things (example; coin and star ratios for each level)  I would pay for the game if it meant a more level playing field.  News flash folks... like everything else on the internet the developers are out to fill their coffers and nothing more.  That‚Äôs why this and every other game like it has such a low win ratio (stars & coins).  They are out for your real life dollars, and don‚Äôt give a rats tail about what you think or comments you make.  That‚Äôs how our society and economy work.  You want to progress quicker... pay up.  The only way you can change it is to not spend the money.  Money or lack there of is what gets their attention nothing else.  They will never read this or any other comment.  Or if hell freezes over and they do, they sure don‚Äôt care about what we think of their business practices and never will as long as someone out there is spending real money to advance in the game.  Bottom line... play but don‚Äôt pay otherwise no changes will ever occur.
sentence: The only way you can change it is to not spend the money.

title: Nothing like the preview
review: I want to first say that I rly like homescapes. I get frustrated with the fact that it‚Äôs takes SOOOOOOOOO many stars to clear a room. Somethings that should take 1star, actually takes 2 or even 3 stars for something SO SIMPLE. things that take steps (such as hanging sets of pictures on the wall) takes 9 stars to complete. Why do u I have to play 9 games just to hang pictures?? Games such as Homescape, matching mansions, gardenscape etc...all have a visual that your job is to figure out how to fix the room. Putting ppl under the assumption that that‚Äôs all they have to do with some games involved. It‚Äôs misleading to give this impression when in fact you are basically candy crushing it out and spending little time ‚Äúfixing things‚Äù and more time playing so that u can fix things. There‚Äôs a story line yes, but honestly the stories end quicker than u can finish a level. Homescape is still a good game. Matching mansions is good and requires less stars to complete tasks. So u get through rooms faster, giving u the feeling that u are actually getting somewhere..but it doesn‚Äôt give u the bright colors that Homescape gives u. Smh

title: The odds are stacked against you
review: I dont know why they do this, but they will rig the game in favor of the AI. It got to the point where I can accurately predict my rolls. If I own 80% of the board, they will only land on the other 20% and that happens 100% of the time. The computer makes trades amongst themselves that aren‚Äôt fair, they‚Äôre only helping each other get sets to knock you out of the game. If you have hotels, the AI WILL NOT LAND ON THEM. Only between your hotels. It‚Äôs laughable at how predictable it is. If a 6 will land you on their hotel, you will roll that 6. I had a property of every color in my last game to ensure no one can build, so what happens? Yup, I land on their railroads only. So what do I do? I buy one of their railroads for a ridiculous price. The next turn, the computer acquired a railroad from another computer to re up the price. I know what you are thinking, why wouldn‚Äôt they buy that railroad prior so that they had all 4? Nah, only when I take the railroad away are they ALL OF A SUDDEN interested. It‚Äôs insanity how much they fix the games in favor of the computer. I have no clue why, we‚Äôve already paid for the game, but they do. It‚Äôs painfully obvious. You‚Äôre welcome for the money I spent.
sentence: It‚Äôs painfully obvious.

Most people put a fake birthday on the game because they don‚Äôt want their real one out there so the update is based off of a majority of fake birthdates so having a limited age is almost pointless because of the inaccuracy of the dates. I think it would be best if instead of the gaming forcing you to use an option based on the date of birth that you put, you have both options in the settings of the game and parents can choose the options for their younger children that way the older people playing can use the option that allows them to talk how they usually would ( before the update) without the quick chat only. It‚Äôs too difficult to function with and I can‚Äôt answer fast enough, it‚Äôs way too confusing. I do not like this update and I really think we should change it back to the old chat. PLEASE. Thank you üëçüèª

title: The old days..
review: Yes, it‚Äôs true, I‚Äôm an OG. I‚Äôve been playing cave game, now Minecraft for as long as it‚Äôs been out. I remember how you could press g or h and you could ‚ÄúClone‚Äù yourself. All this time it‚Äôs been downloaded in my cloud storage, so I never had to buy it. (Heh) This game never stops improving. But of course, I‚Äôm more of a Java version myself, of course. The days of me and the boys, staying up all night, gaming, building whatever we could. I also remember the day when Microsoft bought Mojang, or did they buy Minecraft? Anyways. The first minecon was about 30 people, mostly Notches‚Äô family. The good ol days of Minecraft. A few things could be changed though. The shooting speed of skeletons is very high, I dislike that, I have some other things, but I don‚Äôt want to keep you from doing your jobs. Thanks so much for these amazing 12 years of Minecraft! You guys rock! I can‚Äôt wait for the cave update! :)

title: The developers literally ignored a crucial part of Minecraft
review: After signing in to my Xbox live account, I soon needed to go to a place without WiFi. However, I still wanted to play Minecraft single player. Without WiFi I tried to access Minecraft. Nope. All it said was ‚ÄúSigning in to Xbox live..‚Äù then it crashed. I literally tried everything. Clearing account data, restarting my device, nothing worked. My Minecraft just kept crashing.I can‚Äôt believe the developers managed to overlook a thing that is literally CRUCIAL to Minecraft, it‚Äôs single player ability. IT‚ÄôS LITERALLY CALLED MINECRAFT POCKET EDITION because with pocket edition, people can play Minecraft anywhere. YOU CAN PUT IT IN YOUR POCKET. How hard is it to make sure that Xbox live isn‚Äôt glitchy, doesn‚Äôt CRASH every time you open the app without wifi. Yet with this disgustingly glitchy Xbox live sign in and sign out if you‚Äôre still signed in you can‚Äôt even play without WiFi. How awful. Plus the world I was trying to get into didn‚Äôt even have Xbox achievements. So fantastic job, just fantastic. Now I have to sign in, sign out every time I get WiFi. Because any time I forget to sign out I will be trapped in a cycle of glitchy, crashing bugs every time I enter Minecraft.Awful. Terrible. I would give zero stars if I could unless they fix this ESSENTIAL feature of the game.
sentence: All it said was ‚ÄúSigning in to Xbox live..‚Äù then it crashed.

title: I love this game, but...
review: Recent changes have really annoyed me. First was ads that would play after clicking on the home icon. I don‚Äôt mind ads that I choose to watch because I want to double my reward, but I don‚Äôt want to see ads when moving from one screen to the next. The most recent major annoyance is the red exclamation point on the Shop button. After I click the daily reward and the offers, the red exclamation point still remains. What the heck?!? I don‚Äôt want to keep seeing it. Yes, I know there are special offers, and the daily reward is ready, but what else? The third annoyance is ads within ads. What is this new type of purgatory? I see a screen playing a different ad within the ad that‚Äôs playing. And the last annoyance (for now, anyway) is that the sound is not always off even when the phone is on silent. What if I were in an important board meeting and surreptitiously playing Subway Surfers and the sound for the ad bursts out? If I silence the game, I expect the ads to be silenced as well. I‚Äôll rate Subway Surfers as 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è if the ad issues are solved, because the game play and reward system is great.
sentence: If I silence the game, I expect the ads to be silenced as well.

title: Fun at first, gets boring
review: Here are the reasons I rated it 3 star:#1: It‚Äôs very addicting and fun to play at first, and you don‚Äôt want turn it off#2: The top run thingy is very fun. It makes you push yourself harder and harder to beat the other people‚Äôs high score. This gets you in a competitive mood and makes the game much more fun.#3: Unlocking characters and boards is another way to have more fun in the game. You collect keys and coins over and over until you have enough to unlock that character that you just HAD to have. This gives you another thing to work towards.Although the game has many fun features, it also has a few problems. Here is why I left off two stars#1: Let me set the scene: You‚Äôve seen everybody else have subway surf, so you beg your mom to let you get it. She says yes, so you go to the App Store and download it. You start playing and realize how addicting it is!! You play nonstop for hours. *2 months later* You haven‚Äôt played in a bit, so you open up the app and start playing. You instantly get bored. The problem with this game is that you do the same thing over and over again, different setting or not. It gets very boring. #2: You can‚Äôt get all the characters. Some of them cost money , and some of them you have to have a certain social media for, and some people aren‚Äôt old enough to have FaceBook or whatever.Overall it‚Äôs a fun game but don‚Äôt plan on it being addicting for very long
sentence: Overall it‚Äôs a fun game but don‚Äôt plan on it being addicting for very long

title: Love this game! But you gotta spend money!
review: I love this game! Super addictive and fun. You can spend hours playing it, HOWEVER... as you increase in levels it starts to become less fun. The boards get harder, naturally, but you still only get 1 star for the Hard and Super Hard boards when you win them. But tasks take upwards of 6 and even more stars to complete. And some tasks are just ridiculous to even warrant a star! Make a call, move an object, can take 2 stars at times!! It makes it extremely hard and tedious to advance in the game. Not to mention the coins, you only get at max about 100 coins depending on what level you beat, but if you want extra moves it 900 coins!!! Ok, you do the math.... when it‚Äôs all said and done you have to spend money on extra lives to beat the boards, on coins to advance in the levels and get the stars you need in order to fix things to advance!  As the boards get harder we should get more stars, Hard=2 stars, Super Hard=3 stars and so forth, as we advance in the game tasks cost more stars so we should naturally EARN more stars to off set it!  Not keep us at 1 star per level, but the higher we go tasks are costing us 6-12 stars PER TASK, come on!! Same with the coins! It‚Äôs not fair, and you are forcing people to spend money if they want to continue in the game at a reasonable pace. Love the game, hate the setup! Not spending money on this, they need to change the system!
sentence: I love this game!

title: Welcome Change
review: I‚Äôve been playing the game from the start and have found it to be a staple on every phone I‚Äôve had. I like the update as it makes the game feel kind of new, I play on an iPhone 11 so I haven‚Äôt noticed any issues with the games performance, I‚Äôm only writing this review in support of the Devs in hopes that they might be able to add a couple of things I‚Äôve been wishing for since the beginning. The ability to have a random surfer option and random board option would be great for those of us that have unlocked everything for one. Also while I love the game it‚Äôs time to let us go underground, I love the jet pack and flying around but it‚Äôs over due for a new bonus area or coin grab such as tunnels that go underground then you pop back up onto the tracks from the side of the map or even a side exit wear we venture through a mall, museum or a sports field. We‚Äôve been running straight ahead long enough this could make the game take back some players who have left... just some food for thought...I do live the game and look forward to all updates, just time to see it expand and grow a bit.
sentence: I‚Äôve been playing the game from the start and have found it to be a staple on every phone I‚Äôve had.

title: I LOVE THIS GAME SM
review: This game is so fun! I love all of the updates and in my opinion the new update every one is complaining about is actually really good! But besides all of the amazing stuff my game has been glitching hardcore. So when I spawned into a survival world there was like the unfinished portal thing. Ofc I went to it to loot it and I got a golden pickaxe and sword. When I went to go mine coal it gave me the ore blocks instead of just coal. I didn‚Äôt think much of it until I went to go mine iron and it gave me nothing! This has been happening on every single one of my survival worlds. Maybe because it has Smite 1 on the golden pickaxe but if so why would you give that out to people? I stumbled across a village and went to go see if they had a furnace so I didn‚Äôt have to make one. Halfway through making cooking something in the Blast Furnace it just completely stopped. I tried taking everything out and putting them back in but no. I was really annoyed because I needed to cook food! Since it wasn‚Äôt working I decided to make a regular furnace. Checked the crafting recipe and it wanted a different block than cobble it wanted ‚ÄòBlackstone‚Äô? I didn‚Äôt even know that existed in the game! A lot other glitches have been happening I just can‚Äôt think of all of them right now. Those glitches stood out to me the most. Overall really good game!

title: Not the best update, also where did my 600,000+ coins go?
review: This update is not it honey. I‚Äôve been playing since I was like 5, and the game has never failed to produce quality entertainment. But this, it was just sad to say the least.             It lags, the graphics are childish, and the whole update was a mess. When changing from the character section to the board section I now have to wait for it to load, that didn‚Äôt use to happen. The graphics now seem like a downgrade compared to what it used to be, how do you even do that? Seriously, the game used to be good enough to be played by all ages, but now it seems like only 6 year olds can enjoy the design. Another thing, this may have been a glitch or something, but where did my coins go? I had like 700,000+ coins, but after the update I was down to about 100,000. Not cool. Not cool at all.             I know that you wanted to switch things up, and while I may not like it, it is your game. Hopefully in later updates you will fix things and learn from this experience. Until then, this game will stay deleted. Thanks for the game, at least while it was good. üòî
sentence: Until then, this game will stay deleted.

title: READ!
review: Minecraft is a really fun game for a while, but after a little bit, it gets boring to build houses when your just so impatient. So I saw these worlds you could download that already have houses in them and i thought it would be fun. For example: City Life. It looked really fun to play because you can ride in cars and there are a lot of different buildings you can go in. So it said I could buy it for $5.99 and I did, I played on it with my sisters for hours. I really liked it. This went on for a couple of weeks, but then one day it said it was locked and I had to buy City Life all over again, i was very mad. I already changed stuff in that world and I didn‚Äôt even know that If i rebought it, all my stuff would still be there. I was willing to rebuy because I thought it wouldn‚Äôt happen again and it was just an error Minecraft made. I played on it for an hour or two and I turned it off and didn‚Äôt touch it. The next day, I was excited to play on City Life again, but this time I was furious. It had been only 14 hours and it‚Äôs already saying I have to rebuy it again. I couldn‚Äôt stand it, i wasn‚Äôt going to buy it for the 3rd time in 3 weeks. Now I‚Äôm here hoping that this review will change something and I won‚Äôt have to pay for it EVER AGAIN. Minecraft I‚Äôm waiting.
sentence: So I saw these worlds you could download that already have houses in them and i thought it would be fun.

title: Lots of laugh
review: I love this game and its very addictive.i am a social worker in the foster care field and to alleviate our day my colleagues and I spend our lunch time playing this game. I have been using my iPhone but the iPad is better for the amount of people that are playing. Another issue the purchases don't sync the same in me iPad or iPhone don't know why. I hope this issue can be fixed. Other than that its an amazing game.

title: I love this game, but I have some tips
review: I absolutely truly love this game, I play it ALL the time, but I do have to some tips to make your ratings go a bit higher. First, maybe when you get the boots that make you jump higher, maybe they can make you jump a little less higher then it does now, sometimes when I jump and I‚Äôm under one of those bridge thing‚Äôs, it kills me. Second, maybe make things a little less expensive (characters, buying coins, buying keys, etc..) because then people would most likely buy your things, like 800 keys is 100 bucks (in real human money), in my opinion that‚Äôs kinda pricey. Also, maybe when your in the air, maybe when you hit the side of the boundary the cop and the dog could come with jet packs, it would make it way more fun if a dog and a cop are flying in the air chasing you! Lastly, maybe in the beginning when you first start you can make the characters go a little faster, when you first start the round/game you go sooo slow, maybe that‚Äôs just me because I am a little impatient, but that‚Äôs just who I am haha. And please don‚Äôt think these suggestions are offending you or your app, I love this game and play it all the time! Just a few suggestions! You don‚Äôt have to use them, just trying to put them out there, me as a person is always looking for ways to help out! Have a nice day!~ ‚ú®
sentence: You don‚Äôt have to use them, just trying to put them out there, me as a person is always looking for ways to help out!

title: Terrible support team
review: The game is decent.  It‚Äôs fun and can be a little addicting.  The story lines are cute as well.  Some of the story items cost way too much compared other games and honestly nothing should cost more than 2 stars, let alone stuff that costs 6.  That‚Äôs ridiculous and no other game does it.Speaking of... so when you have to clear 6 game boards to complete a story line task, every one counts, and often you may use a booster for that last piece with your last move.  Only on occasion, when the board is NOT MOVING, an airplane will go take out some random piece that has nothing to do with advancing the game.  You lose a life, and they start to back you into a corner where you need to use coins.  It‚Äôs cheating.  I contacted Support and their response?  Lol ‚ÄúThe way the game works.....‚Äù  sooooo, i understand how the game works, I‚Äôm close to level 3,000.... not what I stated the issue is.  They never addressed the issue and simply kept saying that I don‚Äôt know how to play.  They slid me a couple of boosters to ‚Äúlightening my day‚Äù, whatever that is, and even said at that time ‚Äúthis wasn‚Äôt our fault but here are a couple of boosters to lightening you day‚Äù.  Extremely frustrating that they didn‚Äôt even acknowledge a possible issue.... not even a ‚Äúlet us look into it‚Äù.  Whatever.... I still play but I refuse to buy coins.  I will maintain the free version and spend my money elsewhere.  ‚úåüèº
sentence: Extremely frustrating that they didn‚Äôt even acknowledge a possible issue.... not even a ‚Äúlet us look into it‚Äù.

title: I love love love Minecraft!
review: Minecraft is one of my all-time favorite games to play! I love seeing all of the different updates that are added. Recently, I went at least 2 months without playing which really sucked (STAY IN SCHOOL KIDS) but when I did return to my Minecraft world, there was so much new stuff waiting for me to explore! I think survival is a fun mode if you‚Äôre up for a challenge. Then there are people like me. I start with creative and build everything I want (sometimes I get lucky and find a village) and stock up on everything. I mean EVERYTHING. From food to blocks to animals to weapons, I never want to be caught by a monster in survival without the proper weapon! The villagers are really fun to trade with. When I play Minecraft, I listen to the sound on my airpods and I love the noise that villagers make! I recently made a new world titled ‚ÄúCovid is killing my brain cells‚Äù where I used everything from the inventory. I have my own little zoo and a very enforced prison where I keep the monsters. Ok I didn‚Äôt use EVERYTHING. I didn‚Äôt use endermans because (1) they scare the heck out of me and (2) they could just teleport out of their prison cell and murder me ruthlessly in my sleep. I have an aquarium too with all the sea animals. Whoever thought to add dolphins is my new best friend! So what I‚Äôm trying to say is that I absolutely love Minecraft and would recommend it to everyone! ‚ù§Ô∏è
sentence: So what I‚Äôm trying to say is that I absolutely love Minecraft and would recommend it to everyone!

title: Yeet
review: I really like this game. To my mind, there aren‚Äôt many ads, they do pop up across the home screen occasionally, but you can X out of those easy enough. The other ads are for rewards, which makes it worth it. The actual game is neat. I like the power ups you can get in game, ESPECIALLY the mystery hoverboard. I wish it‚Äôd appear more often. It‚Äôs really cool to be able to test out the different powers. If I had to change something, I‚Äôd want to make an in game option where if you‚Äôre ready to leave the game but don‚Äôt want to click exit or forcefully run into a train, this will be the option for you. Occasionally in the game, there are already stairs or ramps or whatever going sideways, so it‚Äôs be cool to be able to leave that way. Once you take the stairs, ideally there‚Äôd be a short escape scene, maybe with a mystery box or something, just because it‚Äôd have to be a bit tough to actually get in the stairway or whatever the exit is. It could be a special event/mission! I hope you take this suggestion seriously, because it‚Äôd be AWESOME!!!
sentence: It‚Äôs really cool to be able to test out the different powers.

title: Love. It.
review: This game is the best game I‚Äôve ever played in my life. It helped me when I had to get surgery. It helps me when I get home from school. Hands down this is the best game ever, and if you‚Äôre reading this you should definitely get it. It has structures to explore, over 30 biomes, achievements to get, about 85, you can playin friends worlds, in your own worlds, and if you sign in to Xbox live you can pay on servers with players across the globe. You can play worlds in survival or creative, with cheats on or off. The 5 default servers are The Hive, Lifeboat, Mineplex, Mineville City, and Cubecraft games. But there are tons of other servers around too. It constantly updates proving it won‚Äôt go out of business for a whiiiiiiiiiiile. If you‚Äôre looking for an awesome game, get Minecraft.Suggestion:	Maybe in the create world slot you could add more textures and not just the default. You could add past tense, or future tense, or Realistic Minecraft, whatever you want. And possibly, could you eventually add more bosses. Knowing the fact when you beat the Wither and Ender Dragon, there‚Äôs not really anything else to do. Really you could just go to end city, get achievements, that‚Äôs really all that‚Äôs important left. And maybe you could add some guns in the game. There‚Äôs only a bow and crossbow, maybe you could have an AK-47, or a Sniper Rifle, really anything just please add guns.
sentence: You can play worlds in survival or creative, with cheats on or off.

title: My review to the creators
review: I‚Äôve had this app for quite a while now and it‚Äôs always been my 1# game to play when I‚Äôm offline and makes an entertaining game to play online to. The game is fun and requires lots of skill or just fast fingers. My only problems are the prices of some of the items. For the characters I think they can get a little bit pricey. When you get a mystery box it can give you items that help you unlock characters. I honestly think that it might take a month or almost a year to reach the amount because I‚Äôm not joking, they are really pricey. Unless you playing it nonstop without taking your eyes off the screen then it might take a few weeks. But that‚Äôs still a while. Also the hover boards. They can also get a little pricey. And why buy something that you can only use in certain times. It makes it worse that they can get really expensive. Honestly I think their pretty cool but please lower the prices. The last thing you might need to fix is the add lag. Sometimes it will start freezing up and you have to restart the app and that‚Äôs a little annoying in my opinion. I also think that you should only have to face adds if your getting something for free. Other than those issues I truly love the game! Sorry I couldn‚Äôt give it a 5, but I will if you fix the issues ü•∫. Keep making great games!

title: Outstanding! I LOVE IT!!!
review: I‚Äôve been playing Subway Surfers since I was a little kid and practically grew up with it. Even now I think it‚Äôs such a fun and exciting game. It definitely can help pass time. title: Great! But it won‚Äôt let me even open it.

I‚Äôve tried purging all my apps again to clear even more space and I don‚Äôt know what else to do. It gets to the last couple of bars in the loading screen and freezes. It doesn‚Äôt kick me out, just freezes on that and won‚Äôt go into the game. I‚Äôm becoming impatient, waiting for it to go into the game and it still won‚Äôt. title: Too much adds, Glitchy; But fun!

Every time an add plays in the game, it always makes my character crash into one of the train carts. This is a problem that must be fixed or no one will want to play it. title: Subway surfers
review: I love subway surfers! I have probably been playing it for 7 years!! (Or 5 I don‚Äôt remember). But what is really getting on my nerves is when I tap to start running and ad pops up and it really frustrating!!! title: Starting to not like the game
review: I use to love subway surfers it was my favorite game to play but it‚Äôs becoming very annoying with all its issues! I use to have so many characters but this is the third time the game has reset itself and only kept my score and deleted all my money my keys and my characters that I‚Äôve earned. If this continues to happen I will no longer play this game. I‚Äôm so infuriated right now! I had over 180 keys and over 20,000 coins and it‚Äôs all gone back to the original 18 or so keys and 5000 or so coins they give you at the start of your progress. Also I beat all the missions so that I‚Äôd have 30x multiplayer and it‚Äôs back down as well. Again this is the third time this has happened to me and I‚Äôm getting tired of playing to earn all this stuff just for the game to glitch and take it all away. Not once have I taken the game off my phone either. I‚Äôll just go in like normal and everything has been reset except for my score once I sign into Facebook. I honestly don‚Äôt even think I‚Äôll keep the game anymore. sentence: I honestly don‚Äôt even think I‚Äôll keep the game anymore.

title: Very good game, but a few complaints
review: This is an awesome game! I‚Äôll say that. I love this game, I‚Äôm obsessed, I play all the time and I love it!The concept is great! Ten or so people, most are crewmates, who are supposed to fix the ship and keep an eye on things. A couple, however, are imposters and they are supposed to kill all the crewmates while pretending to be one of them. Its a great game. The concept works great! There are so many strategies to use and its so open ended even with rules in place.But however, the new update may have just ruined things for me. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, the quick chat was a good idea, but it doesn‚Äôt work as well as you would think. First off, its missing some crucial phrases and questions. Its like impossible to now ask for proof or evidence. If someone doesn‚Äôt give it, you can‚Äôt get it cause you can‚Äôt ask ‚ÄúProof?‚Äù or ‚ÄúWhy?‚Äù. You also can‚Äôt really question people as easily. This makes it very limiting. That wouldn‚Äôt be as much of a problem if you could use the free chat too, but now you can‚Äôt. As of the update, you cannot use the free chat if you are under 18. This basically ruins the game for all kids. The free chat is good, but not by itself. It extremely limits what you can say and how you get info. It just does not work. Please fix this InnerSloth. Other than that, its a great game!
sentence: It just does not work.

title: Not working!!
review: I purchased Heads Up for .99 and the additional categories for 4.99. However, the app is not working and every time I try to open it, the screen turns black and I get kicked out of the app. I deleted it and installed it again, only to find that the additional categories were missing and had to be purchased a second time. I then reinstalled and repurchased the app and the additional categories, only for the same thing to happen again. I emailed the app developer a week ago but haven‚Äôt received a response. So frustrated and disappointed!! Wasted $11!!!

title: Great fun for all ages!
review: My 10 year old son, 37 year old partner, and my 34 year old self are having the time of our lives playing this game together. We don‚Äôt get to spend much family time. These are priceless memories that we get to save, since each round‚Äôs video can be saved and/ or shared. Play it and see!

title: Great app, but needs work
review: I don‚Äôt know if it is my phone, but I cannot seem to play the Harry Potter trivia pack. I have purchased it multiple times and every time it says my purchase was successful. However, it will not show up in my decks. Then, when I go back to it, it makes me buy it again.
sentence: I have purchased it multiple times and every time it says my purchase was successful.

title: Good game BUT BUGS QUICK CHAT
review: First of all this is a great game but there is a few issues like people walking in walls but really aren't and you are on their screen. The next thing i'd like to report is that when the imposter leaves in a meeting it won't automatically make the crewmates win, it will wait until the end of the meeting to crash everyone's game. The next thing is sabotaging bugs. The latest game i played it the imposter sabotaged O2 but then when it got to zero the numbers went onto negatives all the way to -11. The next important bug is when you are quick chatting, you might vote someone without knowing. The second to last thing i would like to share is on a mobile device when you first load in it just has part of the o and ng in, probably trying to say among us but it only says ong. Finally, the game is great and all, but i think the quick chat feature kind of got the game to become less popular, because you can't say what you want to say, or people just spam their quick chat thing so even when you say no one will see it or even believe it! You can't even say hi or talk about the latest game! Heck you can't even say gg! Are we even going to talk about when you try to join the game it says "the game is full" when it only showed 2 people in it! Also a lot of the time when you quick chat the letters are not in the chat box you made it's just somewhere out of it! PLEASE FIX THESE BUGS SOON INNERSLOTH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
sentence: You can't even say hi or talk about the latest game!

title: Good Way To Waste Time
review: The game concept is great but in order to advance expect to spend time or money on difficult levels. The reward to effort is completely unfair. The base reward is 50 coins while the cost for boosts, extended moves, or just about anything is 900 coins or more. Coins are sold in the shop for .99 cents per 900 which is crazy expensive considering 900 coins will on get 5 additional moves or 3 destroy balls (not sure what they are actually called). If 5 mores moves is not enough to complete the level the next 5 cost 1200 coins. The puzzles are designed to require boosts or additional moves. Each puzzle won rewards a star. Stars are required to perform actions for upgrading the garden or home. Though it is satisfying to watch the transformations and improvements I get frustrated when required to spend a star to greet someone at the door to receive a package, then another star to open the package. All the extra actions not related to actual upgrades seems like a complete waste of stars considering the difficulty of obtaining them.  One good thing added to the game is the option to watch commercials to receive coins. At least with persistence and patience there is a way to get boosts without spending vast amounts of money.
sentence: The base reward is 50 coins while the cost for boosts, extended moves, or just about anything is 900 coins or more.

title: Needs some improvement
review: One of the things I like about this game is that there are no ads. They're pop-up, not videos, so they don't disrupt your game. However, like all games, this one has some problems. My biggest issue is the top run. Every week, the contestants get harder to beat, and eventually you can't get past the last person in the silver because they have over a million. Also, if you get a really good medal, like the diamond, you don't get to keep it for the next week because it changes depending on where you are that week. Another problem is the keys. To revive yourself, you have to pay more and more each time, until it gets so expensive that you can't even afford it. The only way to get keys is in the run, in mystery boxes, or in awards, which is a huge problem because: you only find a key in a run about every eighteen games or so, and if you miss it, then you don't have a chance to get another one. It is extremely rare to get a key in a mystery box, and when you do, it's only one, which can't even begin to pay for the expenses of reviving yourself. It takes a long time to earn a reward, which only gives you three keys, five if you're lucky. So overall, this game is pretty good, but it could use some improvements.
sentence: It takes a long time to earn a reward, which only gives you three keys, five if you're lucky.

title: Addicting but missing something !
review: I love playing monopoly and play this app a lot! I‚Äôm very addicted to this monopoly game app! Worth the money! However it‚Äôs very frustrating when the game freezes in middle of the game and you literally have to exit the game and start a new one. The app should also offer different themes ! Like maybe properties, game pieces and a board of places around the world or different cultures. They only offer a winter theme and that‚Äôs it...and more importantly the app of monopoly should offer a way for you to communicate with other players while actually playing ! Maybe select phrases and emoji icons in order to keep the communication more controlled. It would also be nice to have worldwide competitions amongst all players and win some new game pieces or some type of cool game play feature..and it would allow players to have their own stats and see how many wins and losses and try to pass other players while playing! It‚Äôs honestly worth the money I just feel that the developers can push the game play and app features and designs further and more interactive !
sentence: I love playing monopoly and play this app a lot!

title: Greedy Developers
review: The developers of these kinds of games don‚Äôt care about giving us quality games, they just want to say they are making the games ‚Äúchallenging and fun‚Äù but are really just wanting us to dole out tons of real money to line their greedy pockets... Challenging and fun does not mean rob me blind just to get through some levels on a stupid game that looked awesome but was deceiving... I am having to use all my energy 3-5 times refilled just to get through one level!!! That is 15-25 energy for ONE FREAKING LEVEL!!! Some of these levels are near impossible and the developers don‚Äôt care to listen to our complaints since there are so many of us who give in to buying our way through the game we cannot otherwise get through... I have already uninstalled this pathetic excuse for a game... If I could develope a game similar to this and Matchington Manor/Gardenscapes, even poor as I am I know I wouldn‚Äôt be trying to rip people off... These games could be good and I would be willing to pay for packages but not just to get through levels... The ratio of money we earn in comparison to what things cost is just ridiculous... But like I said the developers of these games do not care about anything but lining heir filthy greedy pockets and I for one will not aid in doing so when I can play actual gun games that don‚Äôt require real money just to progress... Buying packages should be when you want to buy limited time house items or something...
sentence: The ratio of money we earn in comparison to what things cost is just ridiculous...

title: Love this game BUT changes need to be made!
review: I love this game! I‚Äôve played many games, but this one has become my favorite. Over time though, I am beginning to get frustrated! You only get about 50-80 coins a game after completing the level, but in order to get more chances to play it‚Äôs 900 coins for the first 5 extra moves and then goes up to 1200. I don‚Äôt even know what‚Äôs after that, because it‚Äôs just so much! Even with the rewards they grant, you only get 100 coins which is like nothing. You really have to spend money to play this game. I‚Äôve tried to be patient and play the games out without spending money, but many levels you just can‚Äôt! I don‚Äôt mind spending the money here and there, but it‚Äôs so expensive, it doesn‚Äôt even make it worth it. You get 1000 coins for .99 and it takes 900 coins to get 5 extra turns. That adds up really quick! Plus it‚Äôs even more expensive if you want power ups! I‚Äôm not too sure how much more I can continue playing if they don‚Äôt make some changes. It‚Äôs beginning to add up with how many coins I‚Äôve been buying just to beat rounds. On top of that I believe that there are also sometimes when the board isn‚Äôt applying the power ups correctly. It's almost like a glitch or something that‚Äôs not working. I‚Äôm really hoping they make some changes to this game! Such a shame that it seems they are more concerned about money, than people continuing to play.
sentence: I‚Äôve played many games, but this one has become my favorite.

title: Used to love this game but the app never works
review: This is the best game, but the app hasn‚Äôt worked for months and I do every update they provide. Some of their updates even list out the exact problems I‚Äôm seeing and they say that latest update is supposed to fix the problem, so I‚Äôm obviously not the only one having the issues. But the updates never fix it and actually have made it worse over time. Wish I could play this game again!
sentence: This is the best game, but the app hasn‚Äôt worked for months and I do every update they provide.

title: FIX THE AI AND DICE ROLL ALGORITHMS
review: This app has some of the most horrible AI in any game I‚Äôve ever played. Absolutely horrible. Anytime I add an AI in the game, whether I‚Äôm playing with other real players or just a lobby of computers, the AI is seemingly always rolling favorably. It‚Äôs obvious that the computer players cheat via the dice roll. There have been countless games that both me and my brothers have played where the AI player outlasts us because it gets favorable rolls. Even when a whole side of color schemes has been bought up and houses/hotels applied, they always seem to skip over those spaces until the game comes down to human player and AI. This is one of the most frustrating things I‚Äôve ever encountered on a cell phone game because I‚Äôm an avid monopoly player and I‚Äôm well aware that the dice doesn‚Äôt favor anybody at anytime. The math or algorithm behind the dice roll needs to be addressed before I can enjoy this game. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY unless you have people around you and can play locally. Also the game has horrible issues with it disconnecting, and the AI makes you miss out on deals or rolls. Please fix because the premise of being able to play monopoly digitally is well needed.
sentence: There have been countless games that both me and my brothers have played where the AI player outlasts us because it gets favorable rolls.

title: Addicting and fun but..
review: I‚Äôve been playing this game ever since I was 5 and I LOVED IT.  I‚Äôm 12 years old now and still play it to this very day, But as a 5 year old, I guess I really Never understood what the game was about. I just Kinda thought ‚ÄúOh this game is fun and cool‚Äù But never got the message of the game. Subway Surfers Is a game about This kid named Jake and his Friends Who Tend to constantly Paint Graffiti On trains and cause trouble. When The Police showed up, They‚Äôd try to run and get as far away as possible But Eventually get Caught By the Officer.  Now As a Twelve Year old, I‚Äôd Know WAY better than to do such Things, But think About the younger Kids And what they‚Äôd say? Imagine If The Very Next Day you get a call from your child‚Äôs school and Be very suprised  to here your CHILD had been Spraying Paint on the back of the school? I guess my only Recommendation for S.S. Is to maybe make the game 10+ Only? I know it sounds strict but I can Only imagine a child loosing their innocence at the age of 3.  You don‚Äôt have to listen to me but.. Just my opinion. Have a great day! üòä
sentence: I guess my only Recommendation for S.S. Is to maybe make the game 10+ Only?

title: Great! Also might I request a feature?
review: I love this game!!! It‚Äôs so fun! But, I would like to request a feature. Could there be an option to have more intelligent crew mates/impostors in free play? It has usual free play features like picking tasks and being the impostor. But with one major difference: the AI is more intelligent. I‚Äôll give you a look at both sides of this mode. CREWMATE VIEW:You run around doing tasks with the other AI crew mates. And one of the crew mates is the impostor. The impostor‚Äôs AI does intelligent stuff like: trapping you in rooms, sabotaging electricity and such, and so much more! IMPOSTOR VIEW:The crew mates are doing tasks. While your the impostor.
